column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=It is important to have hair that is clean , groomed and presentable .
#text=One key component to good hair is getting it cut .
#text=The way I like it cut is best done within the confines of a beauty school .
#text=To set up a cut at the beauty school which I like to go to , I call in a day or two before to set up an appointment .
#text=At the appropriate appointment time I make my way to the school and check in .
#text=A friendly student always greets me and steers me to her station .
#text=I explain to him or her thoroughly what I like done to my hair .
#text=It helps that I always bring photos in to show what I would like it cut like .
#text=As they cut my hair I always chat with them .
#text=I like getting to know people and this is always enjoyable for me and for my stylist .
#text=At the end of the cut , they brush off all the hair and ask how I like it .
#text=I pay for the cut and am on my way .
